item.title: Sheri add a quote by Cecelia Ahern
item.description: "Anyway, it doesn't matter how much, how often, or how closely you keep an eye on things because you can't control it. Sometimes things and people just go. Just like that." -- Cecelia Ahern

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you'd been before the fall." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Siobhan Vivian
item.description: "You can decorate absence however you want- but your still gonna feel what’s missing." -- Siobhan Vivian

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Toby Barlow
item.description: "Knowing someone isn't coming back doesn't mean you ever stop waiting" -- Toby Barlow

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Mysterious Affair At Styles (Hercule Poirot, #1), The
item.description: "Everybody said, "Follow your heart". I did, it got broken" -- Mysterious Affair At Styles (Hercule Poirot, #1), The

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Andrew Lloyd Webber
item.description: "No more memories, no more silent tears. No more gazing across the wasted years. Help me say goodbye." -- Andrew Lloyd Webber

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Let me tell you this: if you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it's not because they enjoy solitude. It's because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "And when at last you find someone to whom you feel you can pour out your soul, you stop in shock at the words you utter— they are so rusty, so ugly, so meaningless and feeble from being kept in the small cramped dark inside you so long." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Ally Carter
item.description: "I thought about how there are two types of secrets: the kind you <i>want</i> to keep in, and the kind you don't <i>dare</i> to let out." -- Ally Carter

item.title: Sheri add a quote by André Malraux
item.description: "Man is not what he thinks he is, he is what he hides." -- André Malraux

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Nina LaCour
item.description:
"dear today,
i spend all of you pretending i'm okay when i'm not, pretending i'm happy when i'm not, pretending about everything to everyone." -- Nina LaCour

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Cindy Vine
item.description: "I have perfected the art of the fake smile. Inside your heart may be bruised and black, but outwardly you look bright and happy." -- Cindy Vine

item.title: Sheri add a quote by dalis
item.description: "I'm just going to fake a smile . I'm gonna to laugh really loudly . I'm gonna hold back the tears . I'm gonna tell everyone I'm happy . Because I want to see who will notice that I am actually not 'fine' ." -- dalis

item.title: Sheri add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "I lie to myself all the time. But I never believe me." -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Sheri add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "Writer's were supposed to be a litte crazy" -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "You have to know what you stand for, not just what you stand against." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "In one aspect, yes, I believe in ghosts, but we create them. We haunt ourselves." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "When people don't express themselves, they die one piece at a time." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "The one good thing about being kind of shy is that nobody bugs you when you want to be left alone." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Sheri add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "I just want to sleep. A coma would be nice. Or amnesia. Anything, just to get rid of this, these thoughts, whispers in my mind. Did he rape my head, too?" -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Remember me and smile, for it's better to forget than to remember me and cry." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Your past is always your past. Even if you forget it, it remembers you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Demi Lovato
item.description: "I can't set my hopes too high, 'Cause every hello ends with a goodbye." -- Demi Lovato

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Poppy Z. Brite
item.description: "The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets." -- Poppy Z. Brite

item.title: Sheri add a quote by D.D. Barant
item.description: "I've got a bad case of the 3:00 am guilts - you know, when you lie in bed awake and replay all those things you didn't do right? Because, as we all know, nothing solves insomnia like a nice warm glass of regret, depression and self-loathing." -- D.D. Barant

item.title: Sheri add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated." -- Henry Rollins
